title: To carry out day to day supervision in order to ensure that the work on site is carried out in accordance with the development permissions, approved plans, drawings given by Licensed personnel / Architect of the project, structural drawings given by structural engineer
clause_text: To carry out day to day supervision in order to ensure that the work on site is carried out in accordance with the development permissions, approved plans, drawings given by Licensed personnel / Architect of the project, structural drawings given by structural engineer.
